vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.19;
son of: Merari (H4847);
brother of: Mahli (H4249) and Jaaziah (H3269);
father of: Mahli (H4249H), Eder (H5740A) and Jerimoth (H3406K)
Group of mu.shi (מוּשִׁי "Mushi" H4187)
§ Mushites = see Mushi "yielding"
descendants of Mushi, the great grandson of Levi
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Merarí; tribu de Leví; (b)   descendiente de Musí; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
母示族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 見 母示 "柔順的"
利未的曾孫母示的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
母示族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 见 母示 "柔顺的"
利未的曾孙母示的后裔
